channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Does the Big Fed Cut Make Refinancing Worth It?
item.description: Millions can potentially save money by refinancing, but many are waiting for rates to drop further.

item.title: Just like Greenspan, Powell’s ‘recalibration’ on interest rates may boost stock market, strategist says
item.description: That the U.S. no longer needs “emergency levels of monetary squeeze” should be bullish for risky assets, says one strategist.

item.title: Stocks Slip After Fed Cuts Rates
item.description: The Dow and S&P 500 finished lower after the Federal Reserve voted to cut interest rates by half a percentage point.

item.title: EU warns Apple it must open its iPhone operating system to rival developers
item.description: The EU said Apple must make sure devices made by rivals work with its iPhones and iOS operating systems in accordance with the Digital Markets Act

item.title: Get Ready to See Stock Prices in Half-Pennies
item.description: The SEC approved a change to market rules that would cause the prices of many stocks to be quoted in increments of $0.005, which it says will help low...

item.title: Oil prices rise after Fed delivers big interest-rate cut
item.description: Oil futures rose Thursday, gaining ground alongside global equities and other assets perceived as risky, a day after the Federal Reserve delivered a l...

item.title: Where to Put Your Money After the Fed Rate Cut
item.description: What lower rates mean for the trillions of dollars in CDs and high-yield savings accounts.

item.title: Why Gen Z is willing to trade lower pay for a better work-life balance
item.description: Gen Z’s need for “stability, sustainability and safety” in the workplace is due in part to the fact that it started working during the COVID-19 era

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Fall in Week Ended Sept. 13
item.description: Commercial crude oil stockpiles excluding the Strategic Petroleum Reserve fell by 1.6 million barrels to 417.5 million barrels in the week ended Sept....

item.title: I’m 54 and have terminal cancer. I have a wife, 47, and an 8-year-old child. How do I split my $1.5 million estate between them?
item.description: “In short, who should get the retirement accounts and who should get the life insurance?”
